title: wine_Iron_Horse_2012_Wedding_Cuvée_Estate_Bottled_Sparkling_(Green_Valley)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 26892.
country: US.
description: An offering meant to toast all manner of celebrations, this wine wows, blending 78% Pinot Noir with 22% Chardonnay in a near-perfect union. Dry and beautifully floral, it opens in a bouquet of marzipan, peach and honey. The mousse is fine, while supporting acidity lends a lemon peel and grapefruit lift. The memory imprinted on the palate will linger long after all the toasts to the happy couple—or whatever else you're celebrating—have been made..
designation: Wedding Cuvée Estate Bottled.
points: 96.
price: 44.0.
province: California.
region_1: Green Valley.
region_2: Sonoma.
taster_name: Virginie Boone.
taster_twitter_handle: @vboone.
title: Iron Horse 2012 Wedding Cuvée Estate Bottled Sparkling (Green Valley).
variety: Sparkling Blend.
